alert.name: Cluster Operators by Failed Condition alert

panels.description: Cluster operators in Progress, Degraded, Failing, etc...
panels.title: Cluster Operators by Failed Condition

targets.expr: (apiserver_client_certificate_expiration_seconds_count{job="apiserver"} > 0 and on(job) histogram_quantile(0.01, sum by(job, le) (rate(apiserver_client_certificate_expiration_seconds_bucket{job="apiserver"}[5m]))))/60/60

panels.title: HTTP Request Duration by Router Pod

panels.description: Containers in cluster by state, excluding Running and Completed pod status
panels.title: Waiting and Terminated Containers

alert.name: Cluster Pod Requests and Limits alert

panels.description: Kubernetes schedules based on CPU and memory pod requests

targets.expr: sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"}) and count (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Running|Pending|Unknown"} == 1) by (pod)) / sum (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"})

sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu"}) and count (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Running|Pending|Unknown"} == 1) by (pod)) / sum (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"})

panels.title: Cluster Pod Requests and Limits

targets.expr: 100 * sort_desc(sum (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{namespace!~"[0-9].*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) / sum (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace))
